Need Help?

It is my goal to make my modules as intuitive as possible, but some questions may arise.

Feel free to contact me on discord (AdagioT#9507) or checkout the website.

Issues or Ideas?

I try hard to fully test every feature, but some things slip through the cracks. You may also have ideas on how to improve the module.

Please submit any bug reports or feature request to the Issue Tracker.

Want to support development?

There are lots of ways to support development, check here for more info.

Important Changes

Below are just some of the changes to the module that should be called out. The full changelog is also available here.

v2.9.02

  • Support for Foundry v9

v2.8.1

  • Fixed leftover tiles on start bug
  • Fixed animation console bug
  • Korean translation updated

v2.8.0

  • Add compatibility for Foundry version 0.8.6

v2.7.5

  • Add Savage Worlds Adventurer Edition support (SWADE)

v2.7.4

  • Fixed marker sizing issues for non-square tokens on grid/gridless maps
  • Adding option for on deck marker (off by default), to mark who is next to move
